revision.text: * [[File:Blastoise.png|35px]] Blastoise (attacking) vs. [[File:Ninetales.png|35px]] Ninetales (defending) - Blastoise is mono water typed and Ninetales is fire type but the game considers it as a dual fire-fire typed. Blastoise's water type is 2x effective against fire and, since the game considers Ninetales a dual-type, it will double the 2x value making Blastoise's attack deal 4x (2x to each Fire type) instead of 2x. If very effective Water Gems has been fully boosted where the multiplier becomes 3x then Blastoise's attack will deal 9x (3x to each Fire type) instead.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
